scripts.build:dev: name=$(json -f manifest.json name) && json -I -f manifest.json -e "this.name = '$name (dev)'" && (npm run build && json -I -f manifest.json -e "this.name = '$name'") || json -I -f manifest.json -e "this.name = '$name'"
scripts.package:dev: name=$(json -f manifest.json name) && json -I -f manifest.json -e "this.name = '$name (built)'" && (npm run build && npm run package && json -I -f manifest.json -e "this.name = '$name'") || json -I -f manifest.json -e "this.name = '$name'"
